## VoiceSearchEvent interface

Event for starting or stopping voice search.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface VoiceSearchEvent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [timestamp](./analytics.voicesearchevent.timestamp.md) | number | The timestamp (number of milliseconds since the Unix epoch) for firing the event. |
|  [type](./analytics.voicesearchevent.type.md) | [EnumOrString](./analytics.enumorstring.md)<!-- -->&lt;[SearchAnalyticsEventType.VoiceStart](./analytics.searchanalyticseventtype.md) \| [SearchAnalyticsEventType.VoiceStop](./analytics.searchanalyticseventtype.md)<!-- -->&gt; | An enum member or its string value which denotes the event type. |
|  [voiceSessionId](./analytics.voicesearchevent.voicesessionid.md) | string | The UUID for the voice session. Each 'VOICE\_STOP' event should correspond to a 'VOICE\_START' event with the same ID. |
